snippet: Companies are using trucks, buses, RVs and fire engines to promote products through experiential marketing.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column observes advertisers and media companies are using trucks, buses, RVs and fire engines to promote products around the country as part of a popular trend known as experiential marketing.
lead_paragraph: Companies are using trucks, buses, RVs and fire engines to promote products through experiential marketing.
